correctness.rationale: Several fields are correct (IGZO precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ; co-reactant O3; IGZO deposition temperature 250 °C; substrate; pressure 1.2 mTorr; supercycle sequence In2O3–Ga2O3–ZnO; device metrics μFE=21.1 cm2/V·s, Vth=0.4 V, SS=100 mV/dec; device structure TG staggered). However, many values are ungrounded or inconsistent with the article and one clear schema violation exists: (1) Schema violation: processParameters.plasmaPower is set to null but, per schema, if present it must be an object; it should be omitted for TALD. (2) Non-traceable/invented process parameters: dosingTime, purgeTime, flowRates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, numberofCycles, and GPC (0.1 Å) are not reported in the paper. (3) Internal inconsistency: GPC=0.1 Å with 100 cycles would yield ~1 nm, conflicting with the reported IGZO thickness of 10 nm. (4) SupercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles uses compound name “InGaZnO” three times instead of the reported subcomponents (In2O3, Ga2O3, ZnO) with 1:1:1 counts. (5) CarrierGas is set to Ar without support in the article (only purging gas Ar is stated). (6) Material properties block contains many unreported or unlikely values: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap, resistivity, carrier density, roughness, uniformity, conformality, crystallinity, and film density (4.0 g/dm3) are not given in the article and some are implausible; the claimed characterization methods (UV-Vis, AFM, XRD, Hall) are not reported for IGZO here. (7) FilmComposition: atomic ratio 1:1:1 is used as if measured by XPS; the paper only states the supercycle ratio, not a measured elemental ratio; the elemental concentration value is nonsensical. (8) Device on/off ratio (1e7), safety, filmStability, reproducibility are not reported. To improve, remove/replace ungrounded values, fix plasmaPower omission, correct supercycle subcycle counts with proper compounds, and ensure all remaining properties are traceable to the text with correct units.

completeness.rationale: Major omissions and schema errors. (1) Multiple processes are described in the article (IGZO ALD and thermal ALD SiO2 at 200–400 °C, plus post-anneal variants), but only a single IGZO ALD process is extracted; no SiO2 ALD processes (with BTBAS, O3, Ar, temperatures 250/300/350/400 °C, pressure 1.2 mTorr) are represented. (2) Several fields are ungrounded or incorrect: dosingTime, purgeTime, flowRates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, growth-per-cycle, number of cycles, refractive index, band gap, absorption coefficient, resistivity, carrier density, uniformity and conformality are not reported in the paper; on/off ratio is not reported; film density value and unit are inappropriate for IGZO. (3) Internal inconsistencies and schema violations: plasmaPower is set to null (violates schema); thicknessControl GPC (0.1 Å) × cycles (100) contradicts the stated 10 nm thickness; supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles uses ‘InGaZnO’ instead of per-oxide entries (In2O3, Ga2O3, ZnO) and should reflect the 1:1:1 ratio. (4) Misattribution: mobility listed under materialProperties as “Hall measurements” is actually device field-effect mobility; several material properties (crystallinity, roughness) lack support in the article. To be complete, add separate SiO2 ALD process instances for each deposition temperature with BTBAS/O3/Ar and include reported dielectric constant, breakdown field, and XRR density; correct IGZO supercycle to 1:1:1 (In2O3, Ga2O3, ZnO); remove or revise unreported parameters; fix pressure/units consistency; and ensure all included values are traceable to the text.
